import axios from"axios";export var openAddCampaignModalRequest=function openAddCampaignModalRequest(){return{type:'OPEN_ADD_CAMPAIGN_MODAL_REQUEST'};};export var openAddCriativoModalRequest=function openAddCriativoModalRequest(){return{type:'OPEN_ADD_CRIATIVO_MODAL_REQUEST'};};export var openEditCriativoModalRequest=function openEditCriativoModalRequest(payload){return{type:'OPEN_EDIT_CRIATIVO_MODAL_REQUEST',payload:payload};};export var closeAddCampaignModalRequest=function closeAddCampaignModalRequest(){return{type:'CLOSE_ADD_CAMPAIGN_MODAL_REQUEST'};};export var closeEditCriativoModalRequest=function closeEditCriativoModalRequest(){return{type:'CLOSE_EDIT_CRIATIVO_MODAL_REQUEST'};};export var closeAddCriativoModalRequest=function closeAddCriativoModalRequest(){return{type:'CLOSE_ADD_CRIATIVO_MODAL_REQUEST'};};export var openAddFormatModalRequest=function openAddFormatModalRequest(){return{type:'OPEN_ADD_FORMAT_MODAL_REQUEST'};};export var closeAddFormatModalRequest=function closeAddFormatModalRequest(){return{type:'CLOSE_ADD_FORMAT_MODAL_REQUEST'};};/**
 * 
 *  Create campaigns actions
 */var createCampaignRequest=function createCampaignRequest(){return{type:'CREATE_CAMPAIGN_REQUEST',loading:true};};var createCampaignSuccess=function createCampaignSuccess(payload){return{type:'CREATE_CAMPAIGN_SUCCESS',loading:false,payload:payload};};var createCampaignFailure=function createCampaignFailure(payload){return{type:'CREATE_CAMPAIGN_FAILURE',loading:false,payload:payload};};export var createCampaign=function createCampaign(_ref,history){var nome=_ref.nome,cliente=_ref.cliente,produto=_ref.produto,status=_ref.status,dataDeVeiculacaoInicio=_ref.dataDeVeiculacaoInicio,dataDeVeiculacaoFim=_ref.dataDeVeiculacaoFim;return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch(createCampaignRequest());var token=getState().authentication.token;var campaignTest={nome:nome,cliente:cliente,produto:produto,status:status,dataDeVeiculacaoInicio:dataDeVeiculacaoInicio,dataDeVeiculacaoFim:dataDeVeiculacaoFim};axios.post('/campaigns',{nome:nome,cliente:cliente,produto:produto,status:status,dataDeVeiculacaoInicio:dataDeVeiculacaoInicio,dataDeVeiculacaoFim:dataDeVeiculacaoFim},{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){var data=response.data;console.log(data);dispatch(createCampaignSuccess(data));dispatch(closeAddCampaignModalRequest());history.push("/campanha/".concat(data._id));alert('Campanha criada com sucesso');}).catch(function(error){dispatch(createCampaignFailure(JSON.stringify(error)));alert(error);});};};/**
   * 
   *  Get campaigns actions
   */var getCampaignsRequest=function getCampaignsRequest(){return{type:'GET_CAMPAIGNS_REQUEST'};};var getCampaignsSuccess=function getCampaignsSuccess(data){return{type:'GET_CAMPAIGNS_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var getCampaignsFailure=function getCampaignsFailure(data){return{type:'GET_CAMPAIGNS_FAILURE',payload:data};};export var getCampaigns=function getCampaigns(token){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getCampaignsRequest());axios.get('/campaigns',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){return dispatch(getCampaignsSuccess(response.data));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(getCampaignsFailure(JSON.stringify(error)));return console.log(error);});};};/**
   * 
   * Update campaigns
   */var updateCampaignRequest=function updateCampaignRequest(){return{type:'UPDATE_CAMPAIGN_REQUEST'};};var updateCampaignFailure=function updateCampaignFailure(data){return{type:'UPDATE_CAMPAIGN_FAILURE',payload:data};};var updateCampaignSuccess=function updateCampaignSuccess(data){return{type:'UPDATE_CAMPAIGN_SUCCESS',payload:data};};export var updateCampaign=function updateCampaign(payload){return function(dispatch,getState){var token=getState().authentication.token;var _id=getState().campaigns.currentPageCampaign._id;dispatch(updateCampaignRequest());axios.patch("/campaigns/".concat(_id),payload,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){var data=response.data;dispatch(updateCampaignSuccess(data));window.location.reload();}).catch(function(error){dispatch(updateCampaignFailure(JSON.stringify(error)));alert(error);});};};/**
   * 
   *  Get campaign by ID
   */var getCampaignByIdRequest=function getCampaignByIdRequest(){return{type:'GET_CAMPAIGN_BY_ID_REQUEST'};};var getCampaignByIdSuccess=function getCampaignByIdSuccess(data){return{type:'GET_CAMPAIGN_BY_ID_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var getCampaignByIdFailure=function getCampaignByIdFailure(data){return{type:'GET_CAMPAIGN_BY_ID_FAILURE',payload:data};};export var getCampaignById=function getCampaignById(id,token){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getCampaignByIdRequest());var url="/campaigns/".concat(id);axios.get(url,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token),'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(function(response){return dispatch(getCampaignByIdSuccess(response.data));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(getCampaignByIdFailure());return console.log(error);});};};
